name: Project 3 - Color
description:
Project 3 - Color is a 3D Adventure game prototype where the player gives life to the colorless capsules and level as they shoot colorful orbs of light with their mana.

In this project, I worked in a team of 2 total including me to create a game prototype focused on pattern matching. We decided to test out giving the player some control over lighting and giving color to the mob capsules.
